content.detailedDescription:
1.Venia de la casa de una novia que tenia y viv���a unas cuadras mas abajo de mi casa entonces luego me vine y ya estaba pasando por el parque que queda de camino a mi casa, lo estaba atravesando y en ese momento estaba mirando el cielo porque no se que paso en ese momento pero sent��� curiosidad de mirar el cielo y ah��� fue cuando de repente vi este objeto con luces brillantes y de dos colores verde y rojo
2.Estaba mirando el cielo y por atr���s de una monta���a ya que desde ac��� abajo se puede detallar una monta���a y atr���s de la monta���a el cielo entonces estaba viendo para ese lugar
3.Si es la primera y ���nica vez que me ha sucedido esto. la primera imprension que tuve fue de impacto desde el primer momento en que la percib��� porque si generalmente hubiera sido un avi���n yo se como son o por lo menos uno lo distingue mas f���cil pero este objeto era algo diferente algo que jamas habia visto en mi vida sencillamente me quede asombrado y hasta el dia de hoy no lo puedo olvidar porque me algo demasiado importante para mi el ver eso.
4. el objeto era como un ovalo y a sus lados tenia una especie de colores o luces una roja y otra verde pero eran brillantes y cuando se movia el objeto las luces se movian como dando movimientos circulares rapidamente.. bueno el punto es que bajo del cielo como cayendo pero a gran velocidad y parecia que fuera a aterrizar a esa monta���a o mas atras de ella no recuerdo muy bien pero luego cambio de direccion hacia otro lado bruscamente y desaparecio simplemente
5. sencillamente cuando vi ese objeto con esas caracteristicas me quede pasmado que lo unico que hice fue quedarme parado en la mitad de la calle totalmente quieto hasta que el evento termino. no podia pensar nada yo creo que es el mayor momento en mi vida gratificante en el sentido de una experiencia que cualquiera no suele tener en su vida..En ese momento lo unico que hice fue irme con la mente en blanco hacia mi casa porque mi cerebro todavia no podia asimilar lo que me habia acabado de pasar.. cuando lo asimile mas y deje de lado esas emociones fuertes lo unico que pense fue contarle a cada uno de los familiares de mi casa y me escucharon pero no sintieron como esa energia que yo senti y simplemente pensarian que me equivoque y pudo haber sido algo mas y tambien le conte a unos pocos conocidos pero creyeron que estaba tratando de tomarles el pelo y nadie me creyo pero asi me hayan creido o no tengo una satisfaccion enorme porque aparte que he creido en esas cosas desde hace mas tiempo tambien siempre me han gustado estos temas pero aca no hay nadie con ese tipo de pensamientos a profundidad.
6.El simplemente se fue a toda velocidad y desaparacio detras de la monta���a solo eso.
content.summary: Objeto con luz verde y roja bajando con rapidez y luego cambio la dirección bruscamente

content.detailedDescription:
....Under 10x magnification i saw clearly 2 small disc shape objects, just break through the cloud beside each other.
after 5 cloudy days finally cleared up january 20 so i decided to do another overnight observation.  again i waited the moon to rise high in the sky just like last time then i made the first shot at am2:42 then i made the second shot at am2:43.  the photographs were nice and clear but the ghost star still wasn't there any more.  the sky just like before was deep black with no stars just the shiney moon.  at am3:40 i came back and i made another shot at am3:42 and i made a secon shot at am3:44.  i saw nothing unusual by naked eye just a few small cloud patch close to the moon.  next day i made pictures from the last 2 shots that clearly show a flying object at 7 o'clock just edge of the moon.  second photograph show the same object at 9 o'clock direction, the size of the object in this distant must be enormous that logically is a giant asteroid popped out from behind the moon and sling shotted deeper into the solar system.
after a day or two i called one of the scientific government office about my finding, but nobody responded back to me.  then i called one of the government emergency office and again nobody responded.  then i called one of the space scientific office and again nobody responded back to me.
few weeks later on february 18, a 295 yard giant asteroid size of 3 football fields approaches close to the earth in speed of 43,000km/hr.  the slooh space camera detected the asteroid several weeks after i reported the asteroid to the officials, and missing the opportunity to study it in earlier flight.

scenario is this:
the 295 yard asteroid captured by group of six ufo space ships in deep space to use it as an energy source and as a flying vehicle.  they positioned themselves in the backside of the asteroid to shield themselves against meteorites and other flying objects in their way.  then they turned on their spaceship engine thrust and speed up the asteroid appoximately 1000km/second and steered the asteroid to our solar system.  when they reached our solar system they slowed down the asteroid and separated themselves from it.  they continuingly flew to their destination to the earth, unknown location.  the asteroid was steered precisely into the solar system and harmlessly left thanks to the crew of the ufo.
content.summary: Previous case number 54276 group of  six ufo associated to a recently discovered 295 yard long asteroid

content.detailedDescription:
I was shopping at the drug store at the corner of first st and nees st in north fresno, ca.  i happened to look up and saw a stationary object in the nw corner of fresno.  the skies were clear and there were no other aircraft in the area.   i observed the object for about 10 to 15 minutes. i took several pictures which i attached.  

the object made no noise and was stationary.  i am guessing that it was at least 1000 ft or more.   it is difficult to estimate size and height with out having something to compare it to.  

i looked at it with some small binoculars.  there seemed to be larger than just the lighted area.  the pictures do a good job of what i saw. 

by chance i sent the pictures to my daughter and she called me immediately and said that my oldest grandson (11 years old)saw the same thing.  

it is interesting that i saw the same thing last fall.  i did not have a camera that time.   the two sightings we of the exact object.  in both occasions,  the object just disappeared in an instant.  

i do not know what is was but the pictures are interesting to look at. 

tom dewitt
content.summary: I saw something hovering about 1000 feet  to the north west at the corner of first st and nees street. for about 10 to 15 minutes.  then it vanished.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
On january 15 pm11 i finished to watch tv and i did my usual skyhunter routine to go to my south-facing window to watch the deep black sky before i go to sleep.  outside was 40 below zero, there was no stars in the sky, just the shiny moon can be seen.  the moon located on my left side halfway up and a single star i saw beside in 1 o'clock direction 2-finger distant from the moon.  i was surprised because i saw this star a year ago only for one night in the same time last year 2013.  i did not see this star since, but i spend a lot of time to find it.   i call it a ghost star.  when i saw it i didn't make any photograph that time because i didn't know what is it, could be just a star. 
this year on january 15, 2014, i was prepared so i was ready to make a photograph of it.  when i saw it at pm11, it was half-way up in the sky so i waited to rise higher and at am1:44 and am1:45 i made a shot on it.  i was a little bit in a hurry because the clouds started to grow, so after a second shot i stopped my observation.  after this i went to my bed but i couldn't sleep, the ghost star was in my mind.  about am3:00 i gone back to the window and i saw the moon blurry from clouds with some clearings.  i made another shot soon as the moon cleared up.  every photograph i made outside front of my front door from the same position.  next day i slided my camera sd card into my copy machine and i made 3 pictures.  the first on was little bit blurry from my body motion, the second shot came out nice and clean.  but the ghost star some how was stay rough edged.  i was suspicious so i zoomed the ghost star by my copy machine and i used my 10x magnification glass lens to see the details.  i saw the ghost star wasn't a single body object, but the group of 6 individual bodies.  one of bigger one located in 9 o'clock direction, another big ones in double in 3 o'clock direction, 2 smaller ones in 7 and 6 o'clock directions and the last smaller one farther back high in 1 o'clock direction.  the group of flying objects varied in oval and disc shape form.  my first thought was they are maybe a group of meteorites or asteroids.  then i studied the 3rd photograph, it was covered by clouds and small openings and i barely saw something in 1 o'clock direction at the ghost star location that i didn't see that time.  i took a photographs i gone back to the copy machine and i zoomed in on something on another picture.  ( the documentation continue in my next ufo report )
content.summary: Group of six ufo associated to a resently recovered 295 yard long asteroid

content.detailedDescription: We were driving south on i-5 from burbank, ca to i-10. the driver and passenger in the front of the car saw the object first and then i witnessed it a few seconds later out of the back window. it was a triangular shaped craft with 3 lights on the tips of the craft. the craft seemed to flip or shift around effortlessly. it was on the east side of i-5 just above the highest treeline. the craft appeared to be about 90' in between lights.
content.summary: Witnessed large triangular shaped craft with 3 lights at the tips.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting in my room and heard a low humming noise, but did not think much of it. my electricity went in and out slowly and i looked out the window to see street lights doing the same. i then heard honking and saw some cars pulled over and one car where the person had gotten out and was looking up. i went out side and looked and saw 3 lights in the shape of a triangle over the tree line. they were one yellow two green. then it changed 1 green, 2 white. i heard everyone talking but it was difficult as the low humming noise was constant and got louder. then we saw a flash of light come down from it that seemed to make light as day in the area it was shone. then the light disappeared and we thought we couldn't see it anymore, only to realize it was a lot closer all of a sudden. we could make out one solid object. the man got in the car and left. i started to go back in, i turned around to look one final time and it was gone.
content.summary: Huge, triangle, 3 lights, hovering,low humming

content.detailedDescription: I went out to the country to feed some dogs and i looked up in the sky and there was a cloud right beside 2 1000 foot radio towers i thought that was strange because it was the only cloud in the sky as i watched the cloud started to dissipate and then i saw a silver object start to come out of the cloud i saw about 150 feet of it and if i had to say what it looked like i would say a upside down bucherknife blade it was shiney silver it made no sound as i looked it was if i was in a transe  the next second it was turned away from me and started to moveoff i could see the back of it and the back had sections about 40 foot appease and there was 4 of them so i would say it was about 160 feet across the back it looked about 30 foot thick  and as i was watching it moved on down range then it disappeared i was in the army 8 years and it was not ours it scared me pretty good this was jan 12 2014 my wifes birthday the next morning my nose was bleeding after i cleaned my nose there was like a little rock in my nose and this happened every day for 2 weeks there was a long cut in my nose like someboddy drug a fish hook through the bottom of my nose i dont know if it had eny thing to do with the ufo but it was the same time aftr what i saw i dont care if people beleve me or not  but one thing i know for shure is we are not alone
content.summary: Was in the country and looked up at the top of 2 1000 foot radeo towers and there was a ufo sitting there

content.detailedDescription: Yyr
content.summary: Noticed bright object that was shaped liked a cross that moved slowly across sky from north west and traveled slowly to the south west until out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: On a trip to millinocket maine. noticed light about a half hour before bangor and it stayed with us (my boyfriend and i) for over two hours until the sun rose and we could no longer tell if it was there or not. last visible sign was near medway maine. i have multiple videos and don't mind explaining what happened over a phone conversation. i'm typing this from my phone and it's kind of hard to explain. i also have more videos than i uploaded on here.
content.summary: Bright whit light followed our vehicle for over two hours, moving back and forth, close and far, low and high (have videos)

content.detailedDescription: I was taking my dogs out for the last time at around 2:45am shortly after i noticed these colored lights coming from a westerly direction, at first i paid no mind to them, then i realized they were getting brighter and that there was no noise. as the object got closer i could make out a rectangular shape. i continued to watch for a few more minutes as the object continued on a northeasterly course,then just as it started to come over the mountain it just stopped and hovered. it sit there hovering for a few minutes before i realized this isn't an airplane or helicopter or blimp it was totally silent. at this time i noticed that the colored lights were pulsating left to right, right to left. i immediately called for my wife to come and see this object, she had no sooner got out the door when the lights got extremely bright then went out. seconds later the lights came back on, dim first and then bright again. these lights were the brightest lights in the sky, extremely brighter than the stars and any aircraft running lights.  there are 4 airports in a 40 mile radius, the closest being johnstown's john murtha airport, where they keep attack helo's and other military aircraft which you can hear coming before you can even see them.    as my wife and i were watching the object we noticed that there was another craft off to the left of the first one, i told my wife im getting the camera . when i came back outside the lights started to get bright again then all of a sudden the lights on first object changed to form the shape of a diamond. i immediately put the camera on video and started to record, i recorded for about 30 seconds , then hit record again.  the object in the viewfinder was so bright that not even the stars were visible. then as soon as i was done recording i happened to look to the right of the object and noticed that there was another craft similar to the other two. either there were three objects or one extremely large object. it looked like the 3 objects were equal distances apart, if it was one object this thing had to be at least a mile or more across. i have 2 videos but don't know how to upload them to the site.
content.summary: Rectangular shape with red,blue, and green lights running down center

content.detailedDescription:
Over the course of a week i had noticed and intently observed very strange lights/ objects in the sky that had varied in shape, color and size. i noticed these out of my window as these lights had been glaring and glowing brightly across the sky. these objects were directly near the allegheny airport. i have lived close to this airport for some years now and have never seen anything closely resembling what i had witnessed this past week. my boyfriend had also witnessed these with me though he had gone to sleep and i was so astonished by what i had been seeing that i elected to stay up til daybreak. (note)objects persisted into the morning at which time they descented and seemingly dissappeared into mid air.
these objects not only had intrigued me but honestly had disturbed me in that some of these objects seemed to completely defy the laws of the physical world. all of which without making a sound. over the nights these objects had appeared around the same time, in the same place. the objects witnessed mainly were strange lights that had morphed into various shapes and colors and sizes.

 also witnessed was the underside of a very large black triangle that had white and orange lights underneath of it. this structure moved very fast, took up a great deal of the sky directly above my house and was almost stealth like, yet made no sounds. 

the third object witnessed was a white and orange saucer shaped light that seemed to move faster then anything i had ever seen, i have seen many shooting stars and meteor showers and this moved immensely faster then those and also seemed to dissappear in the night sky. 

during the last night of these anamolies i had also witnessed a very strange sound coming out of the woods across from my house. this sound paralyzed me with fear as it did not sound like any of the typical animals that habitate these woods. it started as a clicking sound almost like a dolphin, very high pitched and then progressed into almost a cackling sound. at the same time as the sounds were getting louder a very large gust of wind seemed to appear out of nowhere and then dissappear when the sounds in the woods stopped. was the strange noises just a coincidence? could be. i still feel that it was worthy of mentioning considering the strageness of  events that night. 

i do believe in ufos and would like to investigate further into this matter. this is something i've never encountered before. in searching the internet i have found that numerous people in pittsburgh have witnessed these same exact lights. hopefully, in posting this on mufon pa, i can get in touch with others who have experienced the same.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Repeated similar sightings of strange objects/lights near the allegheny airport that were apparently not normal air traffic that lasted for hours over a week in same area. witnessed by 2 people. made no sound at all.

content.detailedDescription: I was headed north on interstate 10 on the 2nd from right lane (of 5 lane freeway). i first noticed a circle located on the upper-right portion of my car windshield, as i approached the 's' jog in the freeway headed north. the size and brightness of the orb initially caught my eye and as i came out of the slight turn, i slowed to observe the orb. at first, i thought it was a reflection from my windshield; immediately, lowered my passenger window and watched it continue on a parallel tract with the freeway. this orb was just barely over the embankment of the freeway at approximately 20 to 30 percent grade from the freeway. having seen this before on television, i am certain it was a ufo. mixed feelings of awe and confused driving and observation saw it disappear behind the vegetation at the top of the escarpment. i kept checking the rear view mirror for the orb but never saw it again, having passed the site location.
content.summary: Round orb

content.detailedDescription:
I am not the actual observer to report this. the observer that filmed the ufo,s and shot many photos is in fear to release the report or documentation that it will effect his family and profession. i've taken the info shared with me from the observer upon myself to share with the world to broaden consciousness on this ongoing phenomenon .
on new year's eve 2013(12/31/2013) numerous lights(15+) were observed  in the night sky(8:30-9:00pm)pst. miles up the lights made distinct movements and formations that eventually moved closer to the observer. 4 of those ufos descended to about 200 ft to the top of the neighbors house located on a nearby ridge,and approximately 1000ft from the observer.The size of the ufos are similar to the house size in the photos and video. the ufos continued these vertical formation for 10 min. then begun shifting side to side then forming a horizontal pattern now even closer to the ridge line homes. the observer had been shooting multiple pictures during the decent. now filming video as well you here his voice tremble with fear ,yelling for his friends and family( neighbors )to get out side and see this.Then from one of the ufo s comes a white orb small in size that comes in a half circle path that splits the distance of the observer and the ufo s ,then an audio is picked up faintly on the video of classical type music ,the orb moves a little and then abruptly exits the screen very fast .Then the observer stops video and feels as if he is walking on air 3 ft above the ground and sees what appeared to be some kind of " matrix " below him holding him up. 
after zooming in the pictures ,the photos reveal not swirling fireballs as seen with the naked eye but a robotic man with energy sources located at his chest and knees, another revealed three bodies holding hands .Also after for investigation on the photos we found what appears to be a hologram of a portal to another dimension , with some disturbing figures in it , a crucifix  with a pigs head on top and another of a robotic figure exiting through the light. 
i will try to get the photos and video from the observer to post.
content.summary: 4 out of 15 swirling fire balls decend and hover above houses , an orb comes from middle ufo and splits the distance of the observer and ufo ,s ,classical music appears on audio then orb exits very quick to the right of screen

content.detailedDescription: Was laying in bed looking out window when i caught flashing lites then movements got up and looked out saw it stopped in sky with red/green lites.  then saw smaller one with green flashing slightly just southeast of larger one. both stayed still in sky then fell asleep and when woke saw nothing.
content.summary: 2 flashing lights moved in east direction towards sky then stoped and were stationary then flashed like to each other

content.detailedDescription: About 9:00 pm i took the dog out into the back yard to use the bathroom, as i was waiting i looked up to look at the stars. that's when i noticed about 15 lights in the shape of a large airplane or a piece sign, witch i thought was odd because airplanes don't have lights that outline it's shape. i kept looking at it as it flew overhead then in a blink of an eye the lights changed shape into a chevron, after a few seconds the lights changed shape again into a circle except for one light that got out of line a little then quickly got back into place.It never changed shape again for the rest of the short time i was able to observe it. i then went into the house and told my wife we went back outside for awhile but she never saw it and i've never seen it again. i will note the whole time it was changing shape it never deviated from its flight path witch was sw to nw right passed offut air force base, the objects were only about a thousand feet above me and never made a sound.
content.summary: Observed about 15 lights flying in the shape of a large airplane then suddenly changed into a chevron shape then a circle. after that it was out of my sight line

content.detailedDescription:
Photo taken along i-5 from pasadena to oakland california.  photo was taken fro moving car as i  was photographing california hills.  object in sky at first appears to be a cloud in an otherwise cloudless sky  but  it has shape and appears to be in movement.  nothing else in the photo was blurred or doubled because of movement.  please note utility pole and edges of the mountain are not blurred.  this picture was taken with a  panasonic dmc-zs25 digital camera.  perhaps this is nothing more than a digital aberration but i wanted others to see and comment.

at the time of this photo, there were no clouds in the area although 8-10 minutes later, in other photos, clouds were gathering in the sky.  so maybe just a cloud but i can't get over what appears to be a leading edge on the cloudlike shape.

please note my statement of which county i was in when i saw this is estimated based solely on trip time from pasadena to oakland and the time of day it was as we were traveling.  i'd say south of livermore but not more than 75 miles south of it.

i put one second duration of event  because i only saw this in my photograph and didn't observe it otherwise.
content.summary: Photo was taken fro moving car as i  was photographing california hills.  object in sky at first appears to be a cloud but  it has shape and appears to be in movement.  nothing else in the photo was blurred or doubled because of movement;

content.detailedDescription:
What i want to ask is if you would like to look at 2 of my photos i took this autum wile out photograping the aurora in nothern sweden. 
me and my friend saw 2 very bright stars. i told him, thoose stars dosent belong there. he looked up an at the same time the lowest light started to move away and up. mutch like a falling star, but up. 2 seconds later the other light went the same way. when i got home i looked at my photos and noticed that the photo before the one were we saw the lights i caught these things but they were heding down in a zig zag pattern. 
the shutter was on 30seconds. so this was an event that lasted for 30 sec - 1 minute. 


the objects was brighter than jupiter. this is about 50 swedish km from any city. thats 31 miles. so there is no light polution other than the windmills.

i hope you get back to me whith some reflection what it can be.

please get back to me so i know that you recived this.
keep in touch if you want more info.

kr henrik wahlberg
content.summary: 2 bright lights descent, stops, ascents.

content.detailedDescription:
Stepped outside for 5 minutes with my girlfriend to take a break.  witnessed 2 airlines at a high altitude that seemed close together traveling in similar directions (west) when my eye caught an object come into visibility over the edge of my roof moving at high rate of speed.  200-300mph.  winds are low and clouds moving slowly.  the object was moving much faster than clouds and was below clouds.  it seemed to be gaining altitude very quickly as well as it disappeared from view before it was anywhere near the horizon.
my girlfriend saw it as well.
content.summary: White solid sphere moving and ascending at a rapid rate.

content.detailedDescription: I don't know what the cam photographed.I set up the cam to see if feral cats were getting on my back deck.The cam was facing due west and was straped to a piece of firewood on the porch looking at the stairs.It's a clear night,you can see stars in the photo.It was almost a full moon but the moon was on the south side of my house. the cam is set up to take a picture every one minute. i don't know if the object is giving off light or reflecting from the moon.I checked the st clair co crime report to see if any thing was dispatched in my township,nothing was reported or dispatched on.I also got up the next two nights at 3:30-4:00am to check where the moon was at both nights it was overcast but both nights the moon was straight up and to the south of the house.One last thought, between my road and the road to the north the detroit water intake tunnel  from lake huron, which is two miles to the east,goes west for some thirty odd miles before turning south to detroit.I live in a rural farming area.Picture 365 is a daytime picture for scale and location
content.summary: Trail cam set up on back deck to see feral cats

content.detailedDescription: I observed three small cigar shaped (white) objects moving from ne to se in triangle pattern.  the objects were very high in the sky well above the atmosphere which made them hard to see. they looked like small white specs. i observed this from a roof top on 23rd and broadway in nyc.  we had just sat down at a restaurant that had an open roof.  this is the reason i first looked up. we were having lunch in a roof top restaurant in winter with an open roof.  the sky was deep blue with no clouds.  the objects moved ne to sw direction.  they were reflective like the bottom of a plane on a deep blue sky in winter however they were almost not moving.  they were moving as if to survey.  they stayed evenly apart until the northern most shape stopped as the other two continued.  the northern most shape fell well behind the other two.  after a period of about 10 minutes the northern most object headed directly north at a steady but fast pace. the remaining two stayed on course.  after about 10 to 15 minutes more the two objects disappeared. i kept looking up to find the objects when i saw one object going the opposite direction.  then another one joined it going in the same direction, sw to ne.  the object to the south of the other object moved rapidly in front of the other object and made a severe left (northern) right angle turn at a significant pace.  this object disappeared again and the one remaining had a bright light come on from beneath the bottom of the craft.  the light was brilliant much like a light shining thru a large diamond cut prism.  the light would flicker and pulse but the light was always changing.  it was not rhythmic and steady like a strobe light. the light was bright white considering that it was so high up in the atmosphere.  it was a well defined light.  this lighted object started to move in an easterly direction. it went east for about less than 5 minutes and then went out.  i did not see the objects again after that time.  within 3 minutes light wispy clouds started to come thru the area.  i am hoping someone else saw the objects as well.  if you need a land reference the sighting was directly above the metropolitan life building and a bit north in new york city.
content.summary: 3 objects in triangle pattern moving slowing overhead from ne to sw over new york city. .

content.detailedDescription:
I was travelling westbound on i-20 in the passenger seat of my friend jason mitchell's vehicle towards ruston from monroe. we first noticed the light towards the southwest and jason thought it was a planet, but i felt it was too bright. i was surprised and excited, because of how bright it was.

as we got closer to the light, it was more visible as a triangular shape of lights with 3-4 on each side. i don't remember how many total were visible. the lights remained stationary for the entire time it was visible, which was only while we were on the interstate. i can't remember exactly when we lost sight of it. these lights appeared to be located above the city of ruston.

when we got back into town, we went to the catholic student center at louisiana tech and told several friends there about the sighting. several of us got in my friend jason's car and went back out to i-20 to try and see if it was still there, but by then it had disappeared.
content.summary: Observed a bright light travelling westbound on i-20 b/t monroe & ruston. as we got closer, it appeared to be several lights in a triangular shape over ruston.

content.detailedDescription: Small spiraling "black hole", caused distortion of the space around it and was spinning like a whirlpool. would move erratically at about the speed of a jet and then hover. after about ten minutes it started ascending into the clouds much faster than it was moving before and i lost sight of it. i was with my brother and my niece at the time and we all witnessed it.
content.summary: Small spiraling black hole

content.detailedDescription:
The reason i am writing now, 50 years later, is i  now question if it was a spiritual experience rather than a carbon based (form) experience. all my life until now, when i have told close friends about this, none who believed me, i have called it a ufo. but as i study about spiritual phenomena, i now liken the experience to seeing a bright orb. my friend and i had no fear, were sad to see it leave, and felt love for it. it was a love experience if that makes sense to say.

i was in about 8th grade. a friend came over to go trick or treating. we were a little old to be going but wanted to go one last time. so it wasn't a group of us, just two. we were walking down a street, my recollection says a westerly direction, when she said "look at the moon, it's so bright!" i looked up and said "that's not the moon, that's a street light". that's the last conversation as it was over us, hovering. so i feel it came in fast...From a moon perspective to a street light in front of us, to over us.
i have a picture in my mind of where we were when we noticed the bright light. the next picture in my mind we are in the middle of the street looking up and it leaves in a different directional path, and we run through the side of a house's driveway to the backyard but it is gone! we wanted to chase it. we immediately rang the bell of that house and excitedly told them we saw an object but they yelled at us that it was too late to be trick or treating, to go home, and closed the door in our faces. when we returned to my house, my mother yelled at me that we were home too late, to go to bed and she drove my friend home. i think i was grounded for a bit and we never seemed to have talked about it. i'm sure i tried, but wasn't believed. 

i have no recollection of actually being abducted, only this memory of being yelled at about the time. i don't really know if any time had passed or not.  i only know that it was a bright white light, we had no fear, it was over us, close, and perhaps 3-5 feet diameter.

i don't really care if anyone believes me or not. i know what i saw. i just wanted to put out the thought that maybe some of the ufo's people are seeing are of a spiritual nature. maybe these things can change form from pure energy to form. i don't know.
content.summary: Thirteen yrs old. came right to us (my friend and i). hovered. not afraid. left at 90 degree direction. white orb like. seems time went by.

content.detailedDescription: Early in the morning, i opened my drapes to look outside.  it had been lightly foggy for a week or so and i was checking to see if it was still here.  i found ice and snow on the ground (unusual for very southern mississippi - 2 miles from the gulf of mexico).  i found my camera in my purse and decided to take a picture of this unusual event.  i have a nikon cool pix camera which uses an sd card.  when i scrolled back to look at the picture i was frightened half to death at what i saw.  whatever it was was looking at me - eye level - through the window.....But i couldn't see him when i was taking it !!!   only when i scrolled the pictures back to see what i had taken.  it scared me to death.  i started shaking, then i deleted the photo.  i wished later that i hadn't deleted it.  i tried to find someone to go through this sd card and retrieve it.  i found one company that does work for nasa but they wanted $500 - $1200 to find a photo that has been deleted.  i got on facebook and asked a friend of mine (pete creel) who is an photographer if there was someone close by that could try to retrieve this photo.  he said he would get back to me but i haven't heard from him ( i think he thinks i'm crazy).  i am 67 years old, a retired civil service (navy - supship pascagoula) employee, i'm a great grandmother and i don't lie.  please - can i send you this sd card so that you can retrieve this photo?? you can find me on facebook - carolyn bounds fikes.  i have not looked out this front window since this happened.  i have been made a believer in alien life now - where i never believed before.  please help me. by the way, there was no fog or mist that morning.
content.summary: Was looking at me through my front window

content.detailedDescription:
On the night of the sighting i was working on my car's master brake cylinder replacing the seals. i was sixteen years old at the time and it was my first car a 1962 green mgb. upon completing the work on the master cylinder i started the car to warm the engine before i went back inside the house. 
    while sitting in the driver's seat i notice what i thought was the moon rising at first in my rear view mirror through the plastic rear window. i thought it was a large full moon but then it filled the whole mirror and i got out of my car to see what it was. i was standing at the top of th driveway which was about 150 feet from my house. 
     just as i got out of my car my father stepped outside of the house. i yelled down to my father "dad do you see that?" he replied simply "yeah i see it." 
    for some reason it was only then that i got scared and ran as fast as i could down to the house to where my father was standing. we both watched the craft track from over the mountain dip down into our valley and right over our house. it was not more than 30 feet above us. i remember watching the front of the ship come toward us and then fly slowly over us. it was a large oval shaped cylindrical object about 300 feet in length and it took awhile for it to pass over, it was completely silent.
     the next thing that i remember it was 4 am in the morning  and  my father and i were back in the house in my father's studio where he was painting. we never spoke of the incident until 7 or 8 years later when father had been diagnosed with cancer. it was only then that i asked him of his recollection of that evening it was the same as mine including the loss of time. 
    this is the only time i have reported this incident.
content.summary: Long oval shaped ,cylinder. greenish irredescent glow, with long ribbed indentations running the length of the craft. etenstensive mechanical piping criss crossing the bottom of the craft.

content.detailedDescription:
Heard noise by one of my pet dogs and parrote, looked around, was roused from sleep by the pets fussing. with lights out (have exelant nite vision)saw first one then two entities moving in my office.  have line of site from my bedroom through my hallway to the office.  have felt no fear or apperhension, entities did move their arms but were not fast moving. they seemed to be interested in the equipment on my shelf.  (internet box dsl, geiger-counters, meters, and various equipment)the entities stayede less than two menettes,i turned in bet turned back they were gone.     


please note:  am disabled vet, use wheelechair, was using c-pap machine.
not a drug or substance user, do not drink or smoke.
content.summary: In my office, appeared to be observing my woriking gieger counters.

content.detailedDescription: I was headed home from college. i commuted three days a week about 45 miles one direction and came home driving a country road going due north headed toward my driveway as usual. up ahead i saw the ufo craft and it was low to the ground and following me. i stopped to check the mail at the end of my driveway and the craft was almost overhead and just stayed there.  i was very scared. i was sure that i was being watched. i could hear nothing. i drove up my driveway about a third of the way in the object stayed with me so at that point since no one else was home i turned around and drove back out to the main road and turned in the direction i just came.   again the flying object followed me and stayed right with i went down to the end of the road which was about a half a mile and again the objects stay with me turn right heading to west and went to my nearest neighbor that i only knew because they were on the same phone line i was on i had never met them before. i pulled into the driveway of the home and went and knocked on the door leading my car door open and my car out on the road in front of her house. i think she thought i was crazy until she came out a little bit down her walkway and she could also see the object. it was quite obvious when she did see it because she had look on her face she was terrified. she already knew that i was scared. i explain to her how the object had followed me from my home and she was only interested in me leaving so it would follow me away. a quick plan was made that she would watch and observe see what happened when idea drive away. i left continuing do west on the country road that headed toward highway 5. i turned north on highway five and drove toward a very small country store that had not been opened very long.  heavy woods had the view of the sky obstructed to my west. as i drove north i lost size of the object which was flying west of me and again following me. this was about the sixth time it had changed direction. i pulled into the small store and saw that i had lost the object completely i drove up the road a little ways to try to catch another glimpse of the ufo and never saw it again. i drove back to the home where the woman had stood outside and looked at the object with me. she said it followed me when i left. i called the faulkner county sheriffs department and made a report on the phone. the woman that i spoke to said that i was not the only call they had received. no one ever contacted me and i never saw the ufo again.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo at the end of my driveway followed me in my car for about 25 minutes  including one other witness

content.detailedDescription: I have a picture of what looks to be some type of humanoid being behind me. a week previous to this photo being taken i kept seeing ufo crafts in the sky, some quite low, some high up. i kept seeing them often prior to this photo being taken. we did not see the being with our eyes in person, only until we looked at the photo did we notice it behind me. my sister and i were the only ones outside at the time. my sister who took the picture, and me. i was walking back to my car when this was taken. only one other person was inside the house there, and he was inside when i walked out. the door is right to the left of me, i had just walked outside in this photo. so we know this cannot be a person. it seems to be smiling. i thought it was very interesting and i want to share it with people who would be interested. i sent one photo close up and the original photo. this was taken in san antonio, texas.
content.summary: Did not see a ufo this night, only the picture of the being behind me.

content.detailedDescription: 1992.  abducted from bedroom.  never reported incident until now.  lying in bed and suddenly was paralyzed. elevated off the bed through bedroom floor into a fog.  a smoke screen surrounded me. the smoke peeled away into a circular formation where long skinny grey arms came through.  could only see the arms, the rest of the body was hidden behind the smoke. a violent abduction began including anal probe and semen extraction. was subsequently returned to my bed and didnt sleep for the next 3 days.
content.summary: Abduction

content.detailedDescription: Driving home i noticed a couple lights, kind of resembling the big dipper but as i looked around, i noticed other lights gravitating towards these. they went into a v shape, extremely quickly. there were probably 7 or 8. they sometimes seemed to be pulsating. i looked again and suddenly there were only 4. you'd look one second and there'd be 3 in a row and look again and there would be 4, fairly far apart. they were star-like and seemed very far. (planes were closer/bigger) so, i didn't notice any sound. i assumed they were military until they started randomly disappearing. when i got near my home, there were only about two and no longer visable in my neighborhood. a family member texted us while we were seeing it and said they were taking pictures from their home (posted below).
content.summary: 3..Seemed like more kept gravitating to then and in seconds there were 7 or 8. they would disappear and reappear in seconds as well as change direction. star-like. plane nearby but obviously lower and had a flashing light, looking completely different.
